parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit value is number by default limit is 10. ex : ?limit=100

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction value is array / string with rule if array ex : ?direction[]=id&direction[]=name. if string ex : ?direction=id

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Direction value is array / string with rule if array ex : ?order[]=asc&order[]=desc. if string ex : ?order=asc

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search value is string with rule ex : ?search=news

title.example: id labore ex et quam laborum
id labore ex et quam laborum
